titleStmt.title: Spirituall food, and physick vis. Milke for the younger. Meat for the stronger. The substance of diuinitie. A pill to purge out poperie.
Pill to purge out poperie
titleStmt.author: Mico, John.
Mico, John. A pill to purge out poperie.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected and inlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: An edition, corrected and enlarged, of: Mico, John. A pill to purge out poperie.
The second edition of STC 17858, published in 1623 with title: A pill to purge out poperie, which is reprinted in this edition.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
